abstract: A federal grand jury in New York subpoenaed the company, demanding documents about flaws in steering relay rods in cars.
snippet: A federal grand jury in New York subpoenaed the company, demanding documents about flaws in steering relay rods in cars.
lead_paragraph: A federal grand jury in New York has subpoenaed Toyota Motor, seeking information on steering-related defects in its vehicles. The move could widen an investigation into the automaker’s handling of a recall in 2005.

headline.main: Subpoena for Toyota Over Defects in Steering
headline.print_headline: Subpoena For Toyota Over Defects In Steering
